from marilib.tools import units as unit


#===========================================================================================================

[docs]def kvs1g_min_take_off():
    k_vs1g_to = 1.13
    return k_vs1g_to


#===========================================================================================================

[docs]def kvs1g_min_landing():
    k_vs1g_ld = 1.23
    return k_vs1g_ld


#===========================================================================================================

[docs]def seg2_min_path(n_engine):
    """
    Regulatory min climb path versus number of engine
    """
    if(n_engine == 2):
        seg2_min_path = 0.024
    elif(n_engine == 3):
        seg2_min_path = 0.027
    elif(n_engine >= 4):
        seg2_min_path = 0.030
    return seg2_min_path


#===========================================================================================================

[docs]def ceil_oei_min_path(n_engine):
    """
    Regulatory min climb path depending on the number of engine
    """
    if(n_engine == 2):
        oei_min_path = 0.011
    elif(n_engine == 3):
        oei_min_path = 0.013
    elif(n_engine >= 4):
        oei_min_path = 0.016
    return oei_min_path


#===========================================================================================================

[docs]def diversion_range():
    diversion_range = unit.m_NM(200.)
    return diversion_range


#===========================================================================================================

[docs]def holding_time():
    holding_time = unit.s_min(30.)
    return holding_time


#===========================================================================================================

[docs]def reserve_fuel_ratio(design_range):
    if (design_range<unit.m_NM(6500.)):
        reserve_fuel_ratio = 0.05 ;
    else:
        reserve_fuel_ratio = 0.03 ;
    return reserve_fuel_ratio


#===========================================================================================================

[docs]def static_stability_margin():
    static_margin = 0.05
    return static_margin
